title: 26k supporters!!! Let’s keep it going!
description: Wow guys. I had no idea the petition increased so much! Thanks for the support! The fight is far from over though. I’m sure many of you have heard that Warner has decided to keep Amber as Mera. We cannot, and WILL NOT stand for this. Johnny not only lost his job as Captain Jack Sparrow, but as of recently lost his place as Gellert Grindelwald. She has continued to affect Johnny and his career. It’s wrong, and cannot be tolerated. The evidence is clear. So let’s continue to pursue and make our voices heard! Thank you!

title: 1,500 signatures?!? Let’s keep it going!!
description: The support is amazing guys. As I said before, we need to be the voices, and make ourselves heard. Amber Heard should not be an exception when it comes to abuse. So keep it up, and let’s make this petition even bigger!

title: We’re at 400 signatures guys!
description: Let’s keep it up and push for more. I know there’s another petition regarding this situation, but feel that in having 2 will speak MAJOR volumes as to how serious we are about having Amber Heard removed from the DCEU.

title: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, share it EVERYWHERE!
description: We can make this change. We can give the justice Johnny deserves.

title: #JusticeforJohnny
description: I’ve made this petition due to the mistreatment of Johnny. He was unfairly treated by the public, and fellow peers in the entertainment industry. Where’s the voices now that evidence has been brought to light against Amber? Make your voices heard!!!!
